ViewObject.Name: TransactionTableVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT /*+ leading(acct ArPaymentSchedulesV) */ ArPaymentSchedulesV.TRX_NUMBER ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.TRX_DATE ,to_char(ArPaymentSchedulesV.TRX_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') StrTrxDate ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.CUSTOMER_ID ,auasa.CUSTOMER_SITE_USE_ID ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.CUST_TRX_TYPE_ID ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS AS CLASS1 ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.STATUS ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.TERM_ID ,ct.PURCHASE_ORDER AS CT_PURCHASE_ORDER ,ct.previous_customer_trx_id as CT_PREVIOUS_CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.AMOUNT_DUE_ORIGINAL ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.AMOUNT_DUE_REMAINING ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.TERMS_SEQUENCE_NUMBER ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE ,to_char(ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') StrDueDate ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS AS CLASS2 ,(case when ( trunc(sysdate) > ArPaymentSchedulesV.due_date AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS <> 'PMT' AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.STATUS = 'OP') then 'Overdue' else decode(ArPaymentSchedulesV.STATUS,'CL', 'Closed', 'OP', 'Open') end) as AR_LOOKUP_CODE_STATUS_MEANING ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_CONTEXT ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE1 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE2 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE3 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE4 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE5 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE6 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE7 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE8 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE9 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE10 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE11 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE12 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE13 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE14 ,ct.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE15 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY ,ct.ATTRIBUTE1 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE2 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE3 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE4 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE5 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE6 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE7 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE8 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE9 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE10 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE11 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE12 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE13 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE14 ,ct.ATTRIBUTE15 ,null account_number --acct.account_number ,null account_name --acct.account_name ,null selected_flag ,null ERROR_EXISTS ,ct.printing_option PRINTING_OPTION ,to_char(ArPaymentSchedulesV.AMOUNT_IN_DISPUTE) AMOUNT_IN_DISPUTE ,to_char(ArPaymentSchedulesV.AMOUNT_ADJUSTED_PENDING) AMOUNT_ADJUSTED_PENDING ,decode(ct.PRINTING_PENDING, 'N', 'Yes', 'No') PRINTED ,fnd_global.ORG_NAME --decode(ArPaymentSchedulesV.org_id, 404, 'OU_US', 403, 'OU_CA') as ORG_NAME ,to_char(ct.paying_customer_id) PAYING_CUSTOMER_ID ,to_char(ct.paying_site_use_id) PAYING_SITE_USE_ID ,ct.SHIP_DATE_ACTUAL SHIP_DATE ,to_char(ct.SHIP_DATE_ACTUAL,'YYYY-MM-DD') StrShipDate ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.FREIGHT_ORIGINAL FREIGHT_AMOUNT ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.TAX_ORIGINAL TAX_AMOUNT ,ArPaymentSchedulesV.PAYMENT_APPROVAL ,decode(ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS,'PMT',null, 'APPROVED', 'Approved', 'HELD', 'On Hold', 'PENDING','Pending Approval') APPROVAL_STATUS ,ct.BILL_TO_SITE_USE_ID ,ct.SHIP_TO_SITE_USE_ID ,oha.BILL_TO_NAME bill_to_location ,oha.SHIP_TO_NAME ship_to_location ,to_char(ArPaymentSchedulesV.CASH_RECEIPT_ID) CASH_RECEIPT_ID ,decode(ArPaymentSchedulesV.class,'ADJ', 'Adjustment' ,'BR', 'Bills Receivable' ,'CB', 'Chargeback' ,'CM', 'Credit Memo' ,'DEP', 'Deposit' ,'DM' , 'Debit Memo' ,'GUAR','Guarantee' ,'INV', 'Invoice' ,'PMT', 'Payment' ) as ACCT_DTLS_VIEW_TRX_TYPE ,null AS amount_in_claim ,null AS ON_ACCOUNT_AMOUNT ,NVL2(oha.ship_to_name,SUBSTR(oha.ship_to_name, 1, 25) || ', ','') || NVL2(oha.ship_to_address1,SUBSTR(oha.ship_to_address1, 1, 25) || ', ','') || NVL2(oha.ship_to_address2,SUBSTR(oha.ship_to_address2, 1, 25) || ', ','') || NVL2(oha.ship_to_city,SUBSTR(oha.ship_to_city, 1, 25) || ', ','') || NVL2(oha.ship_to_state,SUBSTR(oha.ship_to_state, 1, 25) || ', ','') || oha.ship_to_zip SHIP_TO_NAME ,ct.ship_to_site_use_id SHIP_TO_ID ,oha.RELEASE_NUMBER XX_RELEASE_NUMBER ,oha.COST_CENTER_DEPT||' ' XX_COST_CENTER_DEPT ,oha.DESK_DEL_ADDR XX_DESK_DEL_ADDR -- ,cbd.cons_inv_id XX_CONS_INV_ID --NVL2(bs.batch_source_id, cbd.cons_inv_id, null) XX_CONS_INV_ID -- Commented as per Version 1.4 ,cbd.cons_billing_number XX_CONS_INV_ID -- Added as per Version 1.4 ,null XX_CUST_ACCT_NUM ,null XX_AOPS_CUST_NUM ,oha.SHIP_TO_NAME XX_SHIP_TO_ID ,oha.ship_to_sequence XX_SEQUENCE_1 ,oha.ship_to_sequence XX_SEQUENCE_2 ,trunc(to_date(oha.order_start_time,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) XX_order_date ,oha.orig_cust_name XX_CUST_NAME ,oha.cust_contact_name XX_CONT_NAME ,oha.ship_to_name XX_SHIP_TO_NAME ,oha.BILL_TO_NAME XX_BILL_TO_NAME ,oha.ship_to_address1 XX_ship_to_address1 ,oha.ship_to_address2 XX_ship_to_address2 ,oha.ship_to_city XX_ship_to_city ,oha.ship_to_state XX_ship_to_state ,oha.Ship_to_zip XX_Ship_to_zip ,oha.tax_rate XX_tax_rate ,null as XX_TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES ArPaymentSchedulesV ,ra_customer_trx ct ,ar_irec_user_acct_sites_all auasa ,XX_OM_HEADER_ATTRIBUTES_ALL oha ,XX_AR_CONSBILL_DELIVERED_V cbd WHERE 1=1 AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.customer_trx_id = ct.customer_trx_id (+) AND auasa.session_id = :1 AND auasa.USER_ID = :2 AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.customer_id = auasa.customer_id AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.invoice_currency_code = :3 AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.org_id = auasa.org_id AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.customer_site_use_id= decode(auasa.customer_site_use_id,-1,ArPaymentSchedulesV.customer_site_use_id, auasa.customer_site_use_id) AND ( ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS = 'INV' OR ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS = 'CB' OR ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS = 'DM' OR ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS = 'DEP' OR ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS = 'PMT' OR ArPaymentSchedulesV.CLASS = 'CM') AND ct.attribute14 = oha.header_id(+) --AND nvl(ct.batch_source_id, -1) in (1007, 1003, 1002, 1001, -1) AND cbd.cons_inv_id (+) = ArPaymentSchedulesV.cons_inv_id AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.status = nvl(decode(:4,'OPEN', 'OP', 'CLOSED', 'CL', 'PAST_DUE_INVOICE', 'OP', 'OIR_AGING_-99_01', 'OP', 'OIR_AGING_1_30', 'OP', 'OIR_AGING_31_60', 'OP', 'OIR_AGING_61_90', 'OP', 'OIR_AGING_91_180', 'OP', 'OIR_AGING_181_365', 'OP', 'OIR_AGING_366_400', 'OP', 'ANY_STATUS', ArPaymentSchedulesV.status ), ArPaymentSchedulesV.status) AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE <= decode(:5,'OPEN', ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE, 'CLOSED', ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE, 'PAST_DUE_INVOICE', sysdate, 'OIR_AGING_-99_01', sysdate, 'OIR_AGING_1_30', sysdate-30, 'OIR_AGING_31_60', sysdate-60, 'OIR_AGING_61_90', sysdate-90, 'OIR_AGING_91_180', sysdate-180, 'OIR_AGING_181_365', sysdate-365, 'OIR_AGING_366_400', sysdate-400, 'ANY_STATUS', ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE ) AND nvl(oha.COST_CENTER_DEPT ,'-1') = nvl(:6, nvl(oha.COST_CENTER_DEPT,'-1')) AND nvl(oha.DESK_DEL_ADDR ,'-1') = nvl(:7, nvl(oha.DESK_DEL_ADDR,'-1')) AND nvl(oha.RELEASE_NUMBER ,'-1') = nvl(:8, nvl(oha.RELEASE_NUMBER,'-1')) AND nvl(ct.PURCHASE_ORDER ,'-1') = nvl(:9, nvl(ct.PURCHASE_ORDER,'-1')) -- AND nvl(cbd.cons_inv_id, '-1') = nvl(:10, nvl(cbd.cons_inv_id ,'-1')) -- Commented as per Version 1.4 AND nvl(cbd.cons_billing_number, '-1') = nvl(:10, nvl(cbd.cons_billing_number ,'-1')) -- Added as per Version 1.4 AND ArPaymentSchedulesV.AMOUNT_DUE_ORIGINAL between nvl(:11, ArPaymentSchedulesV.AMOUNT_DUE_ORIGINAL-1) and nvl(:12, ArPaymentSchedulesV.AMOUNT_DUE_ORIGINAL+1) AND trunc( ArPaymentSchedulesV.TRX_DATE ) between trunc(nvl(to_date(:13), ArPaymentSchedulesV.TRX_DATE-1)) and trunc(nvl(to_date(:14), ArPaymentSchedulesV.TRX_DATE+1)) AND trunc( ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE ) between trunc(nvl(to_date(:15), ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE-1)) and trunc(nvl(to_date(:16), ArPaymentSchedulesV.DUE_DATE+1))
